scripts.build: echo Building... && npx tsc index.ts --downlevelIteration && echo Build Done!
scripts.test: npm run --silent update && npm run --silent build && npm run --silent start
scripts.update: echo Updating Dependencies... && npm install --silent && echo Dependencies Updated
scripts.users: echo Building... && npx tsc config/userSetup.ts && echo Build Done! && node config/userSetup.js
scripts.init: echo Building... && npx tsc config/repo-init.ts && echo Build Done! && node config/repo-init.js
